about_the_game:
A modern interpretation of the old "steady hand"/wire buzzer game from the 60's in VR!

Keep your hand steady whilst moving a ring along a wire! Dodge obstacles, be as quick as you can, and don't touch the wire too much or you'll explode!

FURŌ is currently in Early Access, and has many features planned!

Features available in Early Access:

  • Loads of levels, in a variety of bizarre environments!

  • Complete levels and challenges to unlock stars which can be spent on, well, more levels!

Planned feature additions:

  • Multiplayer (Online): Compete with other players to complete levels in the quickest time!

  • Level Editor: Create levels and share them with others!

  • Wildcards: Think of these like a variety of "weapon mods". Slow down time to traverse fast moving "platforms" easier, teleport from one part of the level to another, regenerate health, and more!

name: FURŌ

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 4770k
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • VR Support: OpenXR based devices
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A modern interpretation of the old wire buzzer game from the 60's in VR! Keep a steady hand and maintain your flow!
